title: Mid-Century Modern Creators Recall the ‘Terrifying’ Process of Writing Linda Lavin’s Death Into the Show
description: The first season of Mid-Century Modern was always going to open with a funeral, but creators Max Mutchnick and David Kohan never expected it to also end with another. Now streaming, the Hulu comedy begins with three gay best friends — Bunny (Nathan Lane), Jerry (Matt Bomer) and Arthur (Nathan Lee Graham) — moving in […]
author: Andy Swift

title: A Different World Sequel Series Earns Pilot Order at Netflix
description: It looks like Netflix’s A Different World sequel series is making the grade. The series has earned a pilot order from the streamer, our sister site Variety reports, with plans to shoot a pilot this summer “to get a better sense of the show’s tone and of the chemistry among the ensemble cast.” No casting […]
author: Matt Webb Mitovich

title: Why Shameless Should Never Be Revived
description: Shameless is having a second life on streaming, but after 11 seasons, the series shouldn't follow in Dexter's footsteps. The post Why Shameless Should Never Be Revived appeared first on TV Fanatic.
author: Paul Dailly

title: Will Trent Season 3 Episode 12 Spoilers: Will Investigates A Dangerous Cult
description: Will goes undercover to investigate a dangerous cult on Will Trent Season 3 Episode 12. Check out the spoilers. The post Will Trent Season 3 Episode 12 Spoilers: Will Investigates A Dangerous Cult appeared first on TV Fanatic.

title: Crunchyroll Winter 2023 Simulcast Slate Offers Largest Line-Up Yet

title: Superman & Lois, James Gunn/DCU, Sandman & More: BCTV Daily Dispatch
